chapters.title: Chapter 8: The Figurehead
chapters.info: Chesa, p. 158 (191)—Egwene's plumply pretty maid as the Amyrlin Seat. Egwene often lets her sit in on meetings with Sheriam, her Keeper of the Chronicles, because her unexpected chatter often unsettles Sheriam just enough for Egwene to sidestep what Sheriam was suggesting in a discrete way.
